modName: Skyrim Voice Types List - modders resource
summary: This is a text file which I created by screen capturing each voice type list in the creation kit. This is a modders resource which, for me, has the intent to provide me with a simple, easy, accessible, and searchable database for identifying the types of factions a voice type belongs to.
descriptionHtml:
This is a text file which I created by screen capturing each voice type list in the creation kit. This is a modders resource which, for me, has the intent to provide me with a simple, easy, accessible, and searchable database for identifying the types of factions a voice type belongs to.

This will allow modders to create dynamic characters in their mods, and give assign them to a multitude of compatible factions. The compatible factions will give your npc the voice dialogs which would otherwise be a blank stare if you assigned them to an incompatible faction.

A search of maleeventoned voice type has returned the following results for compatible faction voices:

(A note of caution: The CW... and WI... faction voice types may be unique to my merged mod. It may not apply to you).

CWCitizenCautiousVoiceTypes
DefaultNPCVoiceTypes
FavorGenericVoiceTypes
TempleOfMaraPriestVoicetypes
VoicePowerVoicesList
VoicePowerVoicesListNoDraugr
VoicePowerVoicesListwithTsun
VoicesBandit
VoicesBlacksmith
VoicesBrawling
VoicesCommonAdult
VoicesFollowerAll
VoicesFollowerNeutral
VoicesLumberjack
VoicesMaleEvenToned
VoicesMarriageAll
VoicesMarriageNeutral
VoicesMiner
VoicesMiscShop
VoicesNPCs
VoicesParents
VoicesPCVampireCommon
VoicesPlayer
VoicesVendor
WENPCVoiceTypes
WIAddItem02VoiceTypesSpectator2
WIAssault02QuestGiverVoiceTypes
WICastMagicNonHostileVoicesB
WIChangeLocation01VoiceTypes
WICommentDiseasedVoiceTypes
WICommentMagicColorfulVoices
WICommentMagicDangerousVoices
WICraftItem01BlacksmithVoiceTypes
WICraftItem02EnchanterVoiceTypes
WIDeadBody01Bystander1VoiceTypes
WIKill02RelativeVoiceTypes
WIKill02VictimVoiceTypes
WIMournersVoiceTypesList
WIRemoveItem01VoiceTypes
WIVendorVoiceTypes
WIxxxVoiceTypes

I do not want to invest the time to clean up this list. It, in several places, will contain duplicate lists because of the inability to expand the list window in the creation kit.

Some enterprising person may want to turn this list into an Excel database which would allow sorting by multiple categories.

Credits go to Bethesda for Skyrim
Me for spending the time to make this list
And a program called Capturetext which allowed me to capture unselectable text on the screen and put it in a text file.
author: ultimaxum
